name: Ali-Bebe
overview: The small and helpless ALI-BEBE, an Arab child orphan mother, is lost in a labyrinth riddled with enemies where he was imprisoned by his evil stepfather. To save yourself, you must find the magic lamp in which your protective genius. However, he has no choice but to carry the lamp and two other magical objects, the sword and the pacifier, to the room that does not has a door and place them in their corresponding place. These objects are enclosed in three cameras, which only They open with the corresponding keys, hidden by the intricate labyrinth. There are also some gadgets that ALI-BEBE can use to teleport or enter the room that has no door, although they will not always take us. Where do we want to go. ALI-BABY has only 5 lives and 15 baby bottles, which can throw against his fierce enemies, which will be fought only by some instants. If you feel strong, go ahead, and ... GOOD LUCK!!!
